actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to include as creditable service for civil service retirement purposes service before January 1, 1942, as an air traffic controller in the employ of a State, county, city, or municipality at an airport traffic control tower operated by any Government unit.

summary.text: Includes as creditable service for civil service retirement purposes service before January 1, 1942, as an air traffic controller in the employ of a State, county, city, or municipality at an airport traffic control tower operated by any government unit.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to include as creditable service for civil service retirement purposes service before January 1, 1942, as an air traffic controller in the employ of a State, county, city, or municipality at an airport traffic control tower operated by any Government unit.
